PHASE SUMMARY — Robert Grant — late

Role: 
- Robert is not mentioned as having a specific role in this phase, but he is part of the group observing Paganel's agitation.

Traits:
- Robert is not explicitly described with any traits in this phase.

Relationships:
- Robert is part of the group observing Paganel, along with Lady Helena, Mary, and Glenarvan.

Notable behaviors:
- Robert is not mentioned as doing anything notable in this phase.
